contracts.title: Resolve Master List Duplicate Repo Names
contracts.description: Review and consolidate 15 duplicate repo name pairs in data/github_75_repos_master_list.json. This is blocking accurate SSOT tracking for Batch 2 merges. Must be resolved before Merge #1 verification.

contracts.title: Execute Merge #1 SSOT Verification
contracts.description: After Agent-1 completes Merge #1 verification, execute full SSOT verification: update master list, run full verification, verify system integration. Merge: DreamBank → DreamVault.
blockers: Master list duplicates must be resolved first

contracts.title: Investigate Import Verification Issues
contracts.description: Run detailed import chain validator to identify broken import paths. Address any import issues discovered during SSOT verification.

contracts.title: Continue SSOT Integration and Dead Code Removal
contracts.description: Continue mission: use tools/analyze_unneeded_functionality.py to find and remove more dead code. Focus on execution, not just analysis.

contracts.title: Spreadsheet-Driven Project Automation
contracts.description: Use spreadsheet adapter to automate project tasks from dashboard metrics. Generate project dashboard, review actionable tasks, execute via spreadsheet adapter.
workflow: 1. Generate project dashboard: python tools/project_metrics_to_spreadsheet.py --output dashboard.csv
3. Execute via spreadsheet adapter: python tools/spreadsheet_github_adapter.py --file dashboard_tasks.csv --repo owner/repo

contracts.title: Tools Consolidation via Spreadsheet Automation
contracts.description: Use spreadsheet-driven workflow to finish tools consolidation tasks. Generate consolidation PR tasks, review, and execute via spreadsheet adapter.
workflow: 1. Generate consolidation tasks: python tools/generate_tools_consolidation_prs.py --auto-generate --output consolidation.csv
3. Execute PR creation: python tools/spreadsheet_github_adapter.py --file consolidation.csv --repo owner/repo

contracts.title: Support Agent-1 Stage 1 Integration with SSOT Expertise
contracts.description: Provide SSOT verification support as needed during Agent-1's Stage 1 integration work. Ensure SSOT compliance throughout integration process.

contracts.title: Continue Batch 2 SSOT Verification Workflow
contracts.description: Execute SSOT verification after each Batch 2 merge completion. Update master list, run verification, document results. Progress: 7/12 merges complete (58%).
blockers: Master list duplicates must be resolved
contracts.workflow: After each merge: update master list → full verification → document → report

notes: Master list duplicate resolution is critical blocker. SSOT verification workflow established and ready. Session transition tool created for future efficiency. Batch 2 SSOT verification: 7/12 merges complete, Merge #1 verification in progress by Agent-1.
